trans-unit.source: Make the payment available again in all users’ worklists

seg-source.mrk: Make the payment available again in all users’ worklists

target.mrk: 讓所有使用者可再次使用工作清單中的付款

trans-unit.source: On this tab you can remove the processor from a payment to make the payment available again in all users’ worklists.

seg-source.mrk: On this tab you can remove the processor from a payment to make the payment available again in all users’ worklists.

target.mrk: 在此標籤頁上，您可以從付款中移除處理人員，讓付款在所有使用者的工作清單中再次使用。

trans-unit.source: In addition to the payments in your worklist, this tab also contains payments that are assigned to other users.

seg-source.mrk: In addition to the payments in your worklist, this tab also contains payments that are assigned to other users.

target.mrk: 除了您工作清單中的付款外，此標籤頁也包含已指派給其他使用者的付款。

trans-unit.source: Usually you work only on payments in your worklist. However, if a payment is assigned to another user who cannot finish it, open the <uicontrol>All Payments</uicontrol> tab and remove the user as the processor by clicking <image keyref="loio3d8223555e8b3e6ae10000000a44176d" placement="inline"><alt>Remove Processor</alt></image>.

seg-source.mrk: Usually you work only on payments in your worklist.

However, if a payment is assigned to another user who cannot finish it, open the <uicontrol>All Payments</uicontrol> tab and remove the user as the processor by clicking <image keyref="loio3d8223555e8b3e6ae10000000a44176d" placement="inline"><alt>Remove Processor</alt></image>.

target.mrk: 通常，您僅會處理工作清單中的付款。
然而，如果已將付款指派給其他無法將其完成的使用者，則開啟 <uicontrol>[所有付款]</uicontrol> 標籤頁，透過按一下 <image keyref="loio3d8223555e8b3e6ae10000000a44176d" placement="inline"><alt>移除處理人員</alt></image> 來將使用者移除為處理人員。

trans-unit.source: The payment then becomes available in all users’ worklists and can be processed by another user.

seg-source.mrk: The payment then becomes available in all users’ worklists and can be processed by another user.

target.mrk: 付款則可以在所有使用者的工作清單中使用，且可以由其他使用者處理。
